parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'claude-3-5-haiku-20241022', max_tokens: 500, messages: [{ role: 'user', content: `Extract and categorize this idea from Will. Return JSON only, no explanation:

Input: "${$json.body.message}"

Return format:
{
  "idea": "the core idea in one clear sentence",
  "category": "one of: product, business, personal, tech, creative, life",
  "priority": "one of: urgent, important, someday",
  "related_to": "any related projects or topics mentioned, or null",
  "raw_input": "original message",
  "captured_at": "${new Date().toISOString()}"
}` }] }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ title: $json.idea, content: JSON.stringify($json, null, 2), category: $json.category, metadata: { priority: $json.priority, related_to: $json.related_to, source: $json.source } }) }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ status: 'captured', idea: $('Parse Idea').first().json.idea, category: $('Parse Idea').first().json.category }) }}
